ygData.subject: Spell questions
ygData.msgSnippet: after much research and failures, I finally got Mesmerization. I ve tried to use it a couple times last night but it did not seem to work too well. Most of the
ygData.messageBody:
after much research and failures, I finally got Mesmerization. I've tried to
use it a couple times last night but it did not seem to work too well. Most
of the enemies resisted if not all of them. Any comment on this spell? is
the level 20 color shift better? different?
Also, I've been casting quickness on some tanks in my party and they were
unable to tell me how good / bad it is...anybody got some feedback on that
from tanks who pay attention?
thanks,
Skara
